snippet: Philanthropist David M. Rubenstein has agreed to donate $10 million to the Smithsonian’s new National Museum of African American History and Culture, scheduled to open next fall.

headline.main: Philanthropist Donates to Smithsonian’s African-American Museum
headline.print_headline: A Smithsonian Museum to Get $10 Million

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Museum of African American History and Culture

abstract: Philanthropist David M. Rubenstein has agreed to donate $10 million to the Smithsonian’s new National Museum of African American History and Culture, scheduled to open next fall.
